data.title: Toggle Blackout
data.author: Miguel Silva
data.description:
You have the ability to toggle every light in the room.
Try to reach the exit without getting caught.

data.title: Survival
data.author: gigatesseract
data.description: The spaceship is stuck in a planet, offline and isolated from other members of your species. The planet is very weird, for it allows you to switch gravity according to your will. Navigate through the obstacles in an infinitely side-scrolling game!

data.title: Together Again
data.author: Ashish Gambhir
data.description:
This is the game about connecting a bunch of planets and getting back the glory of the universe!
Our universe is attacked by an evil alien spaceship Tadka who has cut down all the intercommunications between the planets.
Little Zobi is the only one that is left, and he's got his task to connect the planets to get them back online and destroy the evil Tadka.

data.title: The Void is Online
data.author: MarcGuineaCasas
data.description: The Void is online! fight with your ship to turn it offline!

data.title: Audio Dash
data.author: Steven Lambert
data.description: Ride the waveform of your music library while avoiding waves. Play the provided song or upload your own.

data.title: Keep them OFF the LINE
data.author: Sándor Burian
data.description:
Imagine, you are in the woods, at night. The fog will come done. And the zombies are coming...
In this game you should keep the zombies OFF the red LINE. You can shoot with cursor if you point the cursor to a zombie, but don't forget, if they bite 3 times than you will be one of them...

data.title: America Offline
data.author: Jordan J Watkins
data.description: Do not put a bird on it! Get them all off!

data.title: Corrupted Packets
data.author: dwoi
data.description:
WASD/Arrow keys to move, click mouse to shoot.
Shoot the packets to corrupt them and deal damage to the computers.
If you let the packets get to the end, the computers will shoot you. Win by destroying all the computers off.
Didn't really have time to do this concept justice :/

data.title: Offline Pizza
data.author: Marc Cawood
data.description:
The internet DIED!
Everyone is OFFLINE!!
But they still need their PIZZA!!!
As the only PSYCHIC in town, only you can save them.
Divine the customer.
Take their order.
Deliver the pizza.
Keep the market share.

data.title: __OFF_THE_LINE__
data.author: Jesús Olmos
data.description: Fight to be the one who finally stays on the line!

data.title: The OFFLINE Cryptomilitant
data.author: Nomeh Uchenna Gabriel
data.description: You are an Air Force Cadet in the military and your base was attacked by the enemy.The enemy managed to plant a time bomb in your helicopter, when discovered, you were chosen as the operator to defuse the bomb.

data.title: Silent network
data.author: Tchaardge
data.description: From blue to red, travel the network, but be careful, you can use path only once.

data.title: Spines
data.author: dollarone
data.description: Spines is a game inspired by my favourite offline game: Tetris. The spines of the falling blocks will not move once they land, but you can clear them by connecting 6 or more squares of the same colour!

data.title: AAARRRRGGG!!
data.author: tim
data.description: Life of the pirate means always stepping out of(f) line. Crush, kill and loot fire power from other ships so that you can finally hunt down the greatest pirate in these waters and sink his big-ass ship. AAARRRRGGG!!

data.title: Gunturion (Shoot the purple buildings)
data.author: madmaw
data.description: Strange phenomena has overtaken the city, rumour has it that there is a quarantine zone somewhere near the middle, but the route there is hardly safe. Fortunately you've discovered an ancient Gunturion mech, but it's not exactly fuel efficient and the electricity grid is very patchy right now.

data.title: right
data.author: apersonlikesc
data.description:
this is a Casual game
Judge the consistency of word and its color
If it is consistent, press the right arrow or press the left arrow.

data.title: Geoquiz 2
data.author: xem & nghia
data.description:
An enhanced version of my 2015 entry Geoquiz.
2 game modes, 14 categories, 1120 questions!
Code by xem, music by Nghia.

data.title: distortion
data.author: Thijs
data.description: A simple game about not being spotted in a offline world..

data.title: BeatIT
data.author: Hekate
data.description: Hi :) Few months ago I heard about 13kgames on MeetJS in Katowice. Together with collage we got inspired and decided to organise this kind of competition between few developers, based on the same rules. We chose a cathegory "carnivorous" back then. Current contest category may have nothing in common, however I decided that it's a pity not to show you game inspired to create by you :)

data.title: 13Kars
data.author: Kesara
data.description:
13Kars is car game that you are driving against incoming traffic.
Objective is to avoid hitting other cars and collect fuel cells to keep on driving.
This game only consist of grayscale computer generated graphics.
𝓔𝓷𝓳𝓸𝔂!

data.title: Connection Defender
data.author: Brian Douglas
data.description: You are a cyberspace patroller. You have been assigned the task of defending the connection. Make sure that it does not drop to zero.

data.title: Goblin Tower 13k
data.author: mys
data.description:
Goblin Tower 13k (aka) Icy Tower / Xjump game clone. 8-bit pixel art HTML5 platform game set in a tower, where the player's goal is to jump as high as possible.
Main character is Goblin (Sorcerer) from Steem Monsters universe. He is jumping up through each of Splinter's world (Fire, Water, Earth, Life, Death and Dragon). On his tour, player discover many characters and places from the card game.
https://itch.io/jam/steem-monsters-1000-invitational

data.title: Blackout
data.author: AvdeevAndrew
data.description: Blackout is an arcade jumper. You should jump on platforms, turn on ones, connect them into cluster. Kill enemy drones and prevent them from damaging your connected platforms.

data.title: FKnight
data.author: Daxart
data.description: You are a knight. Do not let the enemy pass. You must collect all the gold.

data.title: Subsystem Twenty
data.author: Claythorne
data.description: Navigate a battery powered spaceship from a launchpad to another one.

data.title: Mittens!
data.author: Sabiha
data.description:
Mittens! is a Short Frogger Style game about rescuing your cat by crossing the road avoiding obstacles (monsters).
Play the game at: https://sabihashaik.github.io/Mittens/

data.title: Disconnected
data.author: nshillingford
data.description: Help Lucy and Levi get back online so they can send their messages to each other. You can reveal the solution to each level if completed over the minimal amount of moves but I encourage you to try and figure out the solution on your own.

data.title: This game has a random title
data.author: infernet89
data.description:
This game does not want to be recognizable.
Usually, when you're stuck in a puzzle game, you ask Google for help.

data.title: go OFFLINE
data.author: bartaz
data.description: The title says it all: go offline to get some score.

data.title: 13k solitaire
data.author: tonetheman
data.description: Simple variation of Pyramid solitaire in less than 13k!

data.title: Quest of Tod
data.author: SamirH
data.description: Quest of Tod is a speed running adventure game, where you stuck inside unknown place controlled by strange machine. Can you find all the keys and codes to unlock the exit before the time runs out?

data.title: The Analyser
data.author: Tiago 'Dosaki' Correia
data.description: Your job is to analyse several AIs that have been flagged as behaving erratically. To this end you're given a tool that can interact with these pieces of software in order to diagnose and judge whether or not they should be brought offline or if they're OK.

data.title: Faraday cage Rampage
data.author: Artur Augusto Martins
data.description: Destroy drones with the energy you accumulate on your Tin Foil Hat, collect 10 scraps to build faraday cages around each antenna and get 'em all offline!

data.title: Flying Bubbles
data.author: doga
data.description: You're an outlier bubble who knows that every other bubble are on wrong way. Better to pop some (yellow) bubbles as much as you can and stay away from enemies (red). Some good natured bubbles (power-ups) will help you in this journey.

data.title: Planet Figadore has gone OFFLINE
data.author: picosonic
data.description: Fred lives on planet Figadore in the Hercules cluster, he likes watching cat videos from planet Earth via Parallax Shift, but the network link has gone OFFLINE!

data.title: Online
data.author: NextHeir
data.description: A game in which you are travelling through the internet. Don't get knocked offline.

data.title: Robot Coder
data.author: Schnark
data.description: Robot Coder is a game about coding a robot to run offline.

data.title: offl1n3
data.author: sleepycrow
data.description: You're playing an MMO with your friends, when suddenly you get disconnected from the internet for the third time that day. You decide you've had enough, and go to your ISP to get revenge.

data.title: Hack Yours Neighbours
data.author: Zerneax
data.description: You must DDOS your neighbours because you don't like them :D

data.title: Offline: O.E.C.T
data.author: Ben Fox
data.description: They said organic-electric technology was the way of the future. It seemed promising until a string of natural disasters revealed how fragile the infrastructure really was. Now the building you manage has gone offline and it's up to you to recover the batteries needed to get it back up and running.

data.title: Planet: Offline
data.author: Benjamin T Brown
data.description: Rogue AI has infected the planet! And worse, it has taken over all defense systems and shut down the planetary network! We cannot access the data we need in order to stop it. It is a very dangerous mission, but we need you to fly across the planet and manually uplink with our ground databanks in the hopes that we can shut down the AI once and for all. The more uplinks you complete, the better off we'll be, and the better score you'll have.

data.title: Bullet the Plane
data.author: Pranjal Rastogi
data.description: You are given the charge of a plane and the motive is to shoot the enemy planes and score up!!. It is an ever-running game, just for fun under 13KB :)

data.title: The Red Square Hates To Be Online
data.author: Legit
data.description: You are a red square, called Redsquare and you hate your life. Therefor you try to escape from a planet called online. You have to climb to a new world. But you your brother green square hates you and enjoys seeing you get recjected. So he sends the online police to catch you. Yes the online police are pink triangles. Why certainly!

data.title: Math on Bytes
data.author: Pranshu Chittora
data.description: Brain storm your math skills by answering basic arithmetic questions as fast as you can. For each correct answer you get one 🍺 & for every wrong answer you loose one ❤(life).

data.title: Chains
data.author: Ludmila Bashkansky
data.description:
Touch or click to grow rectangles and circles.
Build chains of alternating shapes to be long as possible.
Hint: off-line chains are better than line chains.
Enjoy!

data.title: I Must Call My Grandmother
data.author: LuisQuin
data.description:
Cellphone's dead. No signal. An offline apocalypse!
And it seems that dead bodies are rising from their graves too.
If that's true, it's not the end of the world. Really, this could be a good chance to see again your gone and beloved Grandma. She could be walking the earth again.
You must find a phone booth and call her!

data.title: Systems Offline
data.author: David Stark
data.description: You awake to find yourself on an abandoned, broken space station. Can you fix the systems quickly enough to survive and escape?

data.title: Offline!
data.author: Thade_wolf
data.description: The source of Internet has been stolen ! Everyone is offline ! You have do tix that, take your keyboard as a weapon and go for it !

data.title: Offline puzzles
data.author: dunin
data.description: Sometimes puzzles are offline.

data.title: data_center
data.author: Zac Garby
data.description: The basic idea is to create a network of servers, switches, routers, and PSUs.

data.title: Hold On
data.author: Andrew James Adams
data.description: Hang to the line for as long as possible. Watch out for falling debri and try to get the best time in this reaction based cliffhanger!

data.title: DISCONN3!CTED
data.author: Maarten Forrier
data.description: DISCONN3!CTED is a 2D tile based shooter game. You need to kill all the enemies and bring their batteries to the helipad to get back online.

data.title: Avoid Being Hit
data.author: Shubham
data.description:
You have to avoid the objects shoot at the ball by two buttons, one moves the ball clockwise and other anti-clockwise.
The more you are able to avoid ,the more you score.
Offline mode will provide an extra color illusion as a amazing challenge to play.
Hints: the trick is dealing with buttons to move clock/anti-clockwise is different from buttons to move left/right and remember the direction to shift as a rotation not movement.

data.title: RushLetters
data.author: Allwin
data.description: Rush letters is a simple Javascript game where random alphabets falls from top to bottom like a meteor shower. Pressing the corresponding key on the keyboard blasts the alphabets and keep you safe. Once any of the letters reaches the bottom the game ends and you are offline and hence the theme.

data.title: Ladies Man
data.author: erdemgonul
data.description:
You are a cowboy whose township occupied by zombies in the wild west during periods when the internet is not there.
You can not get help while there is no internet or phone, everything is in your hands.The town runs away from the zombies and you kill the zombies to save your people.

data.title: Hit the balls
data.author: Vivek Chand
data.description: Balls are randomly moving and colliding, you have 60 seconds to click the balls as many times as possible and get as many as possible points.

data.title: Everyone's Sky
data.author: Rémi Vansteelandt
data.description: Bring peace to the galaxy... or war?

data.title: lost packet
data.author: Dodormeur
data.description:
During a mundane transfert of data, the worst thing that can happen arrived : the connexion was lost !
You are now stuck in the network, trying to survive long enough for the connection to return. But the evil glitches will come to corrupt you !
You must protect your data at all cost : if the glitches gets to it, they will corrupt it. Be wary to not touch the glitches yourself, as they will corrupt you too ! use qsdz/asdw to move, the mouse to look and hold the mouse button or space to load your weapons.

data.title: Feed With Words
data.author: Led10 Deda
data.description: Do you like preparing candies? Well, this time we are going to use letters as ingredients and questions as a recipe. You are curious to know what I just said? Just concentrate, sharpen your eyes, play the game and discover it by yourself.

data.title: You have to get off line
data.author: Mark Vasilkov
data.description: "You have to get off line" is a game about walking a fine line, about four pixels thick, between lasers and more lasers.

data.title: Color Combination
data.author: Asif Uddin
data.description: Each player chooses a color combination of 4 out of 10 and the opposite player guesses it.

data.title: How I Saved the Internet
data.author: Les codeurs du dimanche
data.description:
You are Beverly, an Instagram addict. But today is gonna be the wooorst day of your life: the Internet is down!
It's terrible, because you MUST publish selfies to your followers! You can still use some remaining 3G, but the bandwidth is falling Bytes per Bytes.
Your goal is to fix the Internet! You will have to find a solution by yourself, because everyone is sooo freaking out.
Good luck !

data.title: Pipes Rush
data.author: Jorge Rubiano
data.description: Connected all the pipes before you run out of time, sometimes you must combine colors to achieve the goal, play offline and you will have more time.

data.title: Collision Capacity
data.author: Artsicle
data.description: Journey through a land of black and white and attempt to reach the legendary square which is said to hold infinite power (Of jumping that is). Legend has it that an ancient stone possesses the power to invert your collisions so you may interact with the background, it may help you along your journey.

data.title: System Crawler
data.author: Jubel Cassio
data.description:
This is a rogue like dungeon crawler.
Use the arrow keys to move the character.
Type commands on the terminal input to use scripts (items) or equip/unequip programs.

data.title: You were disconnected
data.author: Marek Łabuz
data.description:
You've been working as always at night...
And suddenly you find yourself...
DISCONNECTED

data.title: Super++ Section
data.author: Remgrandt
data.description: How long can you survive in this tube shooter when your weapons are offline?

data.title: NetShark
data.author: nshillingford
data.description: Type the words that appear to deliver the virus before you're detected. Enter an alias and press enter to start the game.

data.title: Take the network offline!
data.author: Larson's
data.description: It's a beautiful day outside but the networks of the world are dyeing to hook you. Take them out quick before you become entangled in their web of connections.

data.title: off-grid
data.author: Jeremiah Fernandez
data.description:
You have been transported to the Grid.
The only way to get off the grid is to capture the Beacons, that should allow you to locate the Grid Gate, which is the way out.

data.title: Offline Champion
data.author: SciFiThief
data.description: Genre: 2D Fighting. Rules: Both players are standing "online". To win, knock the other player "offline".

data.title: Twisty Polyhedra
data.author: aditya
data.description:
One of the best offline games one can pick up is the Rubik's Cube, arguably the most iconic puzzle of all time.
Many beautiful variants of the twisty puzzle can be created, & this game contains exactly that.
You are given 9 such puzzles of varying difficulty level - each built on the structure of 3 of the platonic solids.
Can you solve them all? Even better, can you master the general strategy that conquers all such puzzles?
Good luck!

data.title: Catch the Signal
data.author: Harshali Talele
data.description: Move the cursor and stay in the range as much as possible to load the information.

data.title: envelope
data.author: xem, o.zattoni & nghia
data.description: A relaxing* puzzle game where the goal is to reproduce a shape using a network of lines.

data.title: MasterPlan - Offline Multiplayer Game
data.author: Grzegorz Tańczyk
data.description: MasterPlan is a offline multiplayer strategy game. It's battle gameplay is inspired by Legion Gold (2002).

data.title: Domination
data.author: Royyan Bachtiar
data.description: Turn based, two player game. The objective is to collect most tile with same color. Each player may start from any corner of the board.

data.title: Can you hear me?
data.author: Francesco Bedussi
data.description: You bought the cheapest phone on the market and you subscribed the cheapest contract you could find... now you have to run after the signal to prevent going offline... but pay attention not to be knocked down by a car!

data.title: Rain Bow
data.author: Sarah Hubschman
data.description: A storm cut out your power leaving you with nothing to do but watch the rain fall. But this isn't ordinary rain, this is musical rain!

data.title: Loadshedding
data.author: Logan Neyt
data.description: Keep the power grid from going offline by selectively disconnecting buildings.

data.title: Raven
data.author: Elliot Nelson
data.description: In this 2D top-down action-puzzle game, the security cameras for a secret facility have been taken offline, and it is YOUR job to fix the problem. Take on a series of floors overrun by mysterious enemies known only as "Raven" -- although harmless as long as you can see them, they are deadly if you turn your back.

data.title: Arithmetic Hunt
data.author: Sergey Chernykh
data.description:
- Move your circle by mouse in order to hit the right expressions and to avoid the incorrect ones.
- Think fast! You have 15 seconds to find next correct expression.
- Small balls are neither dangerous nor count as correct ones.
- As the games goes, the expressions become a bit more complicated and their number increases.
- To show / hide help (while the game is over) use ESC
- To start / restart the game hit SPACE

data.title: Certified Professional
data.author: Ben Fox
data.description: Certified Professional is a game of teamwork and multitasking. You are working with your partner, helping one another to repair a broken power line while also watching out for hazards.

data.title: Planetfall
data.author: Cheng Chiao
data.description: Find the satellite station on each planet and take it offline.

data.title: Offline Hacker
data.author: Havolt
data.description: Offline Hacker is an endless typing game. Words appear on the left hand of the screen and you type them before they get to the right or you lose a life. Lose three and it's game over.

data.title: Angry Cleaning Robot
data.author: Hagai Niv
data.description: A simple prototype of a shooting game.

data.title: Space Force
data.author: Keith Karnage
data.description:
CONTROLS:
Desktop:
Move: WASD/QZSD/Arrows
Shoot: Mouse/Space
Mobile: -dual stick shooter style
Move: Left side
Shoot: Right side

data.title: Energy Drink
data.author: Antonio Raventós
data.description: A hacker develops a virus to destroy her company's network after being unfairly fired. She falls asleep after 2 days working non-stop and spills her favourite Energy Drink, which slips in the machine and makes you - the virus - conscient. While using the help of some friends and avoiding the security measures, you must get to the outside world to destroy all communications before the computer dies.

data.title: Disconnect
data.author: Riya
data.description: Disconnect the connection between circles before time runs out.

data.title: Offlab
data.author: Serpent7776 & pawles22
data.description: Offlab is a tough, platform game where you need to pass through 10 floors filled with dangerous lasers and spikes! You can turn the power on and off whenever you want, turning the lasers off and stopping platforms! Using this power, make it through all floors alive and escape the lab. Good luck!

data.title: Network Offline
data.author: Luke Cann
data.description:
'Offline' is a network puzzle game where you must bring all of the devices in a network back online.
You do this by connecting each device the 'Gateway' node either directly or through other devices.

data.title: Off The Line
data.author: Bryan Perfetto
data.description: Action! Danger! Coins! What more could you want from a game?! Jump off the line and try not to die or throw your keyboard across the room in this twitchy arcade tapper. Can you beat all 20 hand-crafted levels? It's harder than it sounds! Good luck and watch out for those walls!

data.title: Mulligan's Island
data.author: Jon Wiesman
data.description: The classic tale of 7 castaways stranded on an uncharted, desert isle. You are the brave first mate exploring the island trying to find a way to activate the offline communications terminal and send an SOS in this tropical puzzle game.

data.title: SPACECRAFT
data.author: Csaba Csecskedi
data.description: "Space, the final frontier" is your ultimate destination in SPACECRAFT. But first, your mission is to collect as many data tokens as possible from the planets and moons of the Solar System. As their gravity accelerates you have to stay on track as well as dodge space junk and asteroids, or zap them with your booster, at least until your probe goes OFFLINE.

data.title: Network Defender
data.author: Nasos
data.description: You need to protect yourself from viruses, they want you to go offline. Upgrade your antyvirus and stay online.

data.title: Fluffline
data.author: Szokez
data.description:
The Net is down, and you still have to order the toys for your daughter!
Go and repair that firewall, but be careful with those angry dinos and spinning wheels! They will try to stop you!

data.title: Gib
data.author: Attila Horváth
data.description: Gib - A tiny Metroidvania

data.title: Enjoy The Sunshine (Get Offline!)
data.author: eoinmcg
data.description: Another beautiful day. But, look! Nobody appreciates it.

data.title: Don't Touch Anything!
data.author: ABODXDGAMES
data.description: the game is about a kid whom his parents has lifted him at home and tolled him to not touch anything including walls after they leave the adventure start.

data.title: Watashi no shashin
data.author: Brian Hambley
data.description:
Tony must send selfies to his followers on the internet to document his day at the local shopping mall. His mom is picking him up in 1 hour so he must gain as many likes as possible before she arrives.
When the trolls see that you have a signal they will try and get to it also, too many users at a wifi hotspot will drop the signal and you will be 'Offline'. The lower the trolls using your hotspot the more likes you are likely to get.
Haters will chase you, and may send dislikes about your selfies.

data.title: Autopilot Offline
data.author: brohan
data.description: inspired by my many crashes in elite dangerous i've build an 8bit version of the docking minigame, you have to dock by hand because the autopilot is "offline" (this years theme for js13k)

data.title: Space Exploration
data.author: Minh Phu
data.description: This game is an endless running game. Your goal is to avoid as much meteors as possible. The game will start when you enter the website

data.title: BitTrip
data.author: Karl Daniel
data.description: BitTrip is a tiny endless runner style game written in JavaScript for the 2018 Js13kGame Competition. The objective is simple. Keep your bit online for as long as possible, ducking and diving through the hazardous net!

data.title: Debo estar en moda
data.author: ElJavi
data.description:
A guy that want not stay offline in the fashion, then he have to search his jeans.
Use AWD to move or keyboard arrows and mouse to shoot like a sniper.

data.title: THE CORE
data.author: Matthew McCord
data.description: You are one of many workers trapped in a factory and forced to work on THE CORE, a sinister mind control machine. The first version of THE CORE currently has everyone in the factory (workers, guards, managers) under it's control. The second version will enslave the world! Find the four keys, and use the on THE CORE to take it offline for good!

data.title: JS13K Battlegrounds
data.author: Cody Ebberson
data.description: Battle Royale! Fight for survival! Last man standing wins!

data.title: charged
data.author: James Kim
data.description: Everyday we are always charged and online. What if we were to go offline?

data.title: Keep online
data.author: langq235
data.description: Destroy the enemy, keep online

data.title: Keep-Alive
data.author: Surbhi Mahajan
data.description:
The goal is to protect the connected nodes from hitting the obstacles by rotating them either in clockwise or antiClockwise direction.
Keep the connection Alive through all the stages.

data.title: Richy the squeaker boy
data.author: Laris11
data.description: Help Richy turn on his router again before the Fortnite match ends and before his mom catch him. Help him go online again.

data.title: Zurbo
data.author: Eric Rowell
data.description: You are Zurbo, awaken by a mysterious voice leading you to the Throne of Mirrors. With your powerful blaster bow, defeat the evil minions now plaguing your world. Beware of the evil zones - evil is online there, and your blaster won't work. Can you make it to the final fight and survive the epic battle between good and evil?

data.title: Over And Ugh
data.author: IronicallySerious
data.description: Over And Ugh is an interactive game based on a secret service offline status tracker.

data.title: Anti_Virus
data.author: Punit Gupta
data.description: In the era when internet was not everywhere, we all used various offline storage devices to save our precious data. But viruses corrupted our data so many times. Out objective is to go into those devices and kill those viruses.

data.title: Off The Lines
data.author: Kev Etchells
data.description: Keep the balls on the lines. If they crash into each other or reach a gap in the line, they will fall OFF THE LINES.

data.title: Sum It Up
data.author: Hemkaran Raghav
data.description: Stack the cards from the deck to get numbers adding up and beat your's high score.

data.title: Off the Grid
data.author: euston.fish
data.description: This was supposed to be an epic strategy game where you controlled a civilisation, guiding them to prosper for the longest time possible. They would not be alone in the world - other players and their ruins would be scattered around the shared world.

data.title: Offline... in space!
data.author: morticcino
data.description:
Try to catch computer in space... or you lost connection!
You have 60 seconds to hit computers!

data.title: Snooffline
data.author: Adam Giacomelli & Anej Gorkič
data.description: A game about not getting off-the-line. Keep the party going!

data.title: Watch Out
data.author: Dicky Fajar Darmawan
data.description:
avoid the block
reach the high level

data.title: Vortlinio
data.author: carbsrule
data.description: All the content from our Esperanto learning app has disappeared offline, and all we have left is a bunch of emoji!

data.title: ProjectConnect
data.author: Noble Brothers
data.description: In project connect, drones have stolen the internet. It’s up to you in your hover car to go and get it back! First you’ll need to find the ethernet chord and then plug it into the port. BUT WATCH OUT! The drones are on to you and you will need to avoid them or they will destroy your car! Your car is great, however, it’s a BATTERY HOG! There are charged batteries scattered through the levels that are meant for the drones but they will fit in your car to grab them if you can! If you get all of then in an area you’ll even get an extra life!

data.title: Stay off theline
data.author: JennyK
data.description: The goal of the game is to stay offline (don't touch a line) for as long as possible. Lines will constantly move to the left and there is always a chance that a new line will spawn at the right side of the playfield. If you find yourself in a pinch, you can utilize a strong or a weak cut attack that, if it hits the start of a line kills the line. (if you have the charge for it) But be aware! Your shots travel really slowly and they can kill you, too. You will gain exponentially more score points and charge for your shots the further to the right you go.

data.title: Convo IRL
data.author: Matt McKenna
data.description: Great news! A new kid moved into the woods!

data.title: Dueling Spells
data.author: Supratik Das
data.description: This is basic typing game, set in the world of magic. You have to type the spell(given aside), to execute that spell. The spell results in a decrease in opponents' health. The opponent will continually attack you. Keep typing spells faster to defeat the opponent.

data.title: Sabotage
data.author: Muciojad
data.description: You're assigned to stealth mision - disable connection between 3 hostile campuses.

data.title: Sword Art Offline
data.author: Karan Ganesan
data.description: In 2022, a virtual reality massively multiplayer online role-playing game (VRMMORPG) called Sword Art Offline (SAO) is released. On November 6, 10,000 players log into the SAO's mainframe cyberspace for the first time, only if you kill all the octahedron bosses you can go offline.

data.title: Space Trouble
data.author: jannehuo
data.description: You have to control the astronaut back to spaceship in middle of space storm. Use your arrow keys to control the astronaut and try to hit the back end of the spaceship.

data.title: Balance
data.author: Kaisei Fukaya
data.description: Balance is a game about trying to walk a tightrope (or slackline?) without falling off.

data.title: NichtOffline
data.author: Nichtgian
data.description: play offline with friends

data.title: Adventure Time
data.author: Harsh Jain
data.description: You have to save princess from this evil world. In this world, there are different types of monsters and traps, so be careful. Also a lot of places are there with hidden treasure.

data.title: INSIDE THE RECT
data.author: s2terminal
data.description: You are the OFFLINE square. Keep inside the rectangle if you, and can get score. Don't touch corners of the rectangle.

data.title: Access Points
data.author: Julien KERMAREC
data.description: All the city internet network is broken, you need to reconnect the nearest access points between them

data.title: konnekt
data.author: monsterkodi
data.description: Konnekt is a simple Real-Time-Strategy game.

data.title: Hotspot Lovers
data.author: xaterz
data.description:
It's almost Valentine's Day, but no one seems to be pairing up! Everyone is too busy with their phones.
As Cupid, you have to do something about it!

data.title: Totally usual offline dino runner
data.author: Serpent7776 & pawles22
data.description: Totally usual runner.

data.title: ICE-X
data.author: elementalsystems
data.description: Free the great minds from the data locks in this retro cyberspace arcade game.

data.title: Risky Nav
data.author: Sebastian Dorn
data.description: They are out there. Roaming through the forest, searching for prey. They can feel the flow of networks. Go online to use the navigation and you shine like a beacon in the dark. But how else can you find the safety of the hidden bunker?

data.title: Off the Line is Bad
data.author: Jeff Carver
data.description: Move left and right to try and keep from falling through gaps in the lines as they scroll up the screen.

data.title: Labi
data.author: rkowalczyk
data.description:
Find wifi signal in a maze and become civilized man.
Use keyboard, touch or gamepad to play.

data.title: ONOFF
data.author: Bran Dunino
data.description: Navigate through 25 brain-teasing levels in this fast-paced, hand-crafted platformer. You'll dodge spikes, jump over pits, and toggle between dimensions.

data.title: You Are Offline
data.author: Kev Etchells
data.description: You are trapped in a room. There is no way out. Your only hope is to contact someone to rescue you. The only problem is: YOU ARE OFFLINE.

data.title: spaceshmup
data.author: RagingPixel
data.description: You're lost in space, all ship systems are offline.

data.title: Offline Race
data.author: LDOC
data.description: Offline Race is an online game where you have to defeat to your rival in a race to get connection.

data.title: Lines Off
data.author: SergiCL
data.description: The main idea of the game begins with a pun about this year's theme: "Offline" becomes "Deactivated Lines".

data.title: Call Center Mess
data.author: kucukkanat
data.description: The biggest Internet Service provider's connection is down and is offline. Angry clients are calling from everywhere. Pick up the phones to fight complaints.

data.title: Re-Wire
data.author: Jan Mankopf
data.description: Bring the system back online by rewiring the power nodes.

data.title: purplFLOW
data.author: _primecode
data.description: This is my first try at the WebXR category. I did this myself and didn't have much time to finish it by 13th September, unfortunately, because I started 9th grade. I'll continue to develop purplFLOW on the game's GitHub page until it's an eventually feature-complete game.I would love any ideas/help on the game in any way! You can open an issue (or read what I'm planning to add)

data.title: Offline Search - The Game!
data.author: David Storey
data.description: Rediscover the magic of looking up someone's phone number in the days before the internet!

data.title: Exo
data.author: Jack Oatley & ai Doge
data.description: A space based tower defence game! Build satellites and stations around planets orbiting a distant star. Survive waves of enemies.

data.title: Pickr
data.author: Ivan Lesar
data.description: A multi-gradient color picker game.

data.title: Programmer Quest
data.author: npasquali
data.description:
Killing infernal demons bores you?
Slaying dragons doesn't feel the same anymore?
Maybe saving the world has become a tedious routine?
Then try Programmer Quest!
You will see what is like to be a developer:
- Exciting life (not like those boring warriors, defeating hordes of enemies)
- Bugs (well, someone might call them features)
- Meetings (lots and lots of meetings)
- "Nice" colleagues (hide your hostility behind a mask of sarcasm!)
- Stress (oh yes, there will be a lot of it)

data.title: An Offline Life
data.author: Ryuno-Ki
data.description: You were browsing with your shiny new 56k modem as somebody pulled the plug.

data.title: Datacentre Simulator
data.author: Alan Reed & Mike Smith
data.description: You work in the data-centre for Peruvian Web Services, monitoring their servers. The equipment is old and ineffective, so regularly requires manual intervention to keep running. Can you make sure that connections receive packets fast enough to prevent the data centre from going offline?

data.title: Line of Fire
data.author: Siorki
data.description:
Line of Fire is a realtime battle arena, inspired by Scorched Earth.
You have two minutes to capture eight beacons or destroy your opponents.
Extra ammo is delivered by air, watch out for crates as AI players will try to collect them too.
You start with an expendable observation drone, press Space to launch and again to switch the view between tank and drone.

data.title: Off Line
data.author: Willem van der Doe
data.description:
Move around with WASD.
Your score is the amount of time you spend on the line.
Stay on the green line or else your health will drain.
Avoid the orange squares or else your health will drain very quickly.
Pick up the blue squares to increase your health.

data.title: Singularity
data.author: Frank Mitchell
data.description:
"Meteor impacts detected. Life support systems offline. Escape pods launching in 30 seconds..."
- Pegasus II, final transmission

data.title: Pronto
data.author: Markus Fisch
data.description: A very simple reaction game about not getting off the line. Works on your mobile too.

data.title: Offline Paradise
data.author: sirxemic
data.description: The world, a paradise, has gone offline; everything has become grey and dangerous. Traverse, jump and dash over the obstacles to turn the world back into normal.

data.title: Interplanetary Postal Service
data.author: Sebastian Macke
data.description:
As a postman of the Interplanetary Postal Service your task is to deliver precious mails to our distant colonies. This game lets you control a lander module
on the last miles to the colony. You must not only fight against gravity, but also against dangerous winds. Play through 8 uniquely designed levels.

data.title: Disconnect Maze
data.author: Mark Rhodes
data.description: Disconnect the machines before being caught!

data.title: All Systems Offline
data.author: stevespectre&wilzi
data.description: You have to leave Earth with a damaged spaceship immediately! Control systems are almost offline, so you have to avoid planets manually by using the effect of their gravity field. These four items will help you on your way, try to pick them up: fuel (to use the nozzle system), plasma (to destroy planets), beam (to pick up items in a radius), and money (to upgrade items).

data.title: When my vpn goes offline it allows all kinds of people to snoop on my computer, such as demons...
data.author: Lucas Bersier
data.description: When my vpn goes offline it allows all kinds of people to snoop on my computer, such as demons and monsters, and that’s inconvenient because I’m trying to finish writing this paper.

data.title: Offweb
data.author: Digital Resistance
data.description: Year 2018, startups have become big global corporations that control the world through the internet. The Digital Resistance has managed to switch it off and it’s creating a new open network for the rebels, weirdos and underdogs.

data.title: Off Land
data.author: Pegasus FV
data.description:
Web skill game, a 100% mouse based. There are 7 levels with two difficulty variations. It includes fullscreen functionality.
Mr. Bowman is lost in space and needs to restore the communication station, thus he will be able to contact earth and ask for help. The Game Objective is to collect all the transmitter components.
Game inspired in the dynamics of the classic "Jewel Thief" written in '92 (http://raebear.net/comp/jewelthief.html)

data.title: Astro Miners
data.author: Lance Ewing
data.description: The year is 2349 AD. A private company, Astro Miner Co. (AMC), has begun mining operations on the surface of a large asteriod in our solar system. You work for AMC and are responsible for remotely controlling the 10 robotic miner ships that are deployed to the asteroid.

data.title: EAAITO
data.author: neilbgames
data.description: Evil Alien Artificial Intelligence Take Offline or EAAITO for short is a shooter type game. It is a bit glitchy as I ran out of time to finish it properly but I thought I would enter it anyway. The aim of the game is to take down the evil alien artificial intelligence by running your tank over the green buttons and progressing on to the next level, shooting aliens and collect power ups along the way.

data.title: Service Provider
data.author: Kamil Sacewicz
data.description: You are a (Internet) Service Provider. Just make sure the service won't go offline, okay? Now take your flyswatter and go!

data.title: UNDERRUN
data.author: Phoboslab
data.description: A twin stick shooter in 256 shades of brown.

data.title: welcome to the cyberspace
data.author: kulak
data.description: Fight with the cybernetic hordes of enemies and restore the connection to the real world in this isometric retro-style cyberspace shooter. Can you beat them?

data.title: Shutdown
data.author: goldins
data.description: Shutdown the computers before they get infected!

data.title: DOWNLOAD!!!
data.author: meowingman
data.description: A packet of data trying to be downloaded before the network is disconnected

data.title: Cat Out!
data.author: Daniela Braniste
data.description: Cat Out! - A modern Calico touch on the most played game in the world.

data.title: Enmeshed
data.author: Mark Barr
data.description:
A hacking puzzle / strategy game. Exploit vulnerabilities in nodes and connections to knock a dynamically-routed mesh network offline.
Bring down an evil corporation's mesh network in Story mode, or test your skills against randomly-generated mesh networks in Challenge mode.

data.title: Submersible Warship 2063
data.author: Jerome Lecomte
data.description: Enemy submarines have invaded your perimeter. Stay off their radar and fight back! Submersible Warship 2063 is inspired by 3D submarine simulator Subwar 2050 (Microprose, 1993)

data.title: Earth that was
data.author: Jaime Gonzalez Garcia
data.description: The future of mankind is in your hands HAL-9000. Find a new earth. Save us.

data.title: The Chroma Incident
data.author: Ryan Malm
data.description: The Achromats have taken the worlds color offline! Raid their colorless lair and vanquish them all, restoring the world to it's technicolor glory. A twin-stick shooter playable with gamepad or keyboard+mouse. Huge thanks to Herebefrogs for naming the game!

data.title: Not online
data.author: Arian Dehghani
data.description: In this game, you are a server admin, and you need to defend the server against attackers who are DDOSing the server.

data.title: BotWar
data.author: John Godsey
data.description: Welcome to BotWar. Program your own bot to fight against your opponents! Inspired by RobotWar, Color Robot Battle, and Crobots.

data.title: Did you escape?
data.author: Petre Adrian
data.description: A hacker notices that someone is tracking his virtual steps so he has to clean up all the data saved on his computer to avoid being caught.

data.title: Welcome to Cyberspace
data.author: Dietrich Epp
data.description: You can go around and shoot emoji brains.

data.title: ISP
data.author: Michael Wolken-Möhlmann
data.description: Manage a 1990s Internet Service Provider. Connect new customers, repair defective data hubs and always keep an eye on your budget.

data.title: Offline: A Social Media Experience
data.author: Christian & Samuel
data.description: Fight against your ever waning self-esteem through the power of social media. Post quickly to receive social validation and increase your score.

data.title: WIRED
data.author: bope999
data.description:
This is a turn by turn game. Main goal is to pick up all coins of your color in right order, and kill your enemies. There are two teams, blue and red, and 2 players in each team. Can be played against CPU or another human.
In every turn you got two dices thrown, you move both players, and you can choose what player will play what dice. When you finish moves for one of the players, if some enemy player is on the same line (vertical or horizontal), you will electrify him, and he will go back to the field where he picked up his last coin. If you already complete all coins, you now have an electroshocker, then you will kill that enemy, and when you kill both of them, you are the winner.

data.title: Curvilinear
data.author: svntax
data.description: In Curvilinear, you must look around to find and collect coins while avoiding any moving lines.

data.title: Jump Off Line
data.author: Nick B
data.description:
Jumping will erase the line you are running on.
Keep jumping to avoid enemies and stay on screen.
See how many jumps you can last!

data.title: Sushi Kitchen
data.author: Platane
data.description: Command a fleet of cook to craft sushi!

data.title: Internet Quest
data.author: Ivan Fonseca
data.description: A brief quest to save the Internet.

data.title: Close To Me
data.author: Alex Swan
data.description:
Heavily inspired by Just Shapes and Beats.
Avoid the lines, or anything pink.
Use WASD to move, Space to dash, and r to restart.
You rank better by being hit less. Go for S rank!

data.title: Blasting Shrapnel
data.author: Alan Rawkins
data.description: Fly through space blasting enemies and collecting power orbs. Orbs fill your energy meter and power up your guns. Fully power the meter to win.

data.title: Cloudapocalypsis now: the learning of machines
data.author: salc2
data.description:
Cloudapocalypsis now: The learning of machines.
Cloud computing and Machine learning. It will be a good idea they said. Well... they learned.
Now you need to stop the machines smashing datacenter where they are connected to.

data.title: B1ack0ut
data.author: Gabo
data.description:
"Suddenly, the world went offline... insanity ruled as people could not cope with being disconected. Now, you'll have to survive while dealing with your own internet addiction.."
This is just a silly survival game that's a bit of a mess all around... but at least it has some charm I think...
Controls:
- Just click the buttons and scroll the text.
--- Indoors map ---
- The fully colored square is where you are.
- Yellow squares are unvisited rooms while White squares are already visited rooms.
- Green squares are the exit to the streets outdoors.
- You can only move to adjacent rooms.

data.title: NoetWork
data.author: Jose Bueno
data.description: As a network specialist, you must close all the gates that mantaint you NetWork not working... and offline! Just tap the screen when both holes of every gate were together, but don't take it too seriously and enjoy!

data.title: Keep me red
data.author: Achhu
data.description: You are the offline symbol. You should not touch the green lines which are coming at you. Don't touch those greedy green lines to stay offline.

data.title: Bo the dog
data.author: Asisa Asseily
data.description:
Bo the dog fell into the RGB screen.
Can you help Bo to find his way back into the offline world?

data.title: Get the Pigeon
data.author: Aurium
data.description: Fly over a landscape to catch a red pigeon without sensors, pannel, or radio. You must to pilot a plane inclining your head as you need.

data.title: Network Hell
data.author: Zack Urben
data.description: In Network Hell, you play the role of a request traveling back up the OSI Stack to try and connect to the outside world. Move quickly and pickup packets along the way to provide data to your consumer with the least response time.

data.title: Left And Right
data.author: Abdun Nihaal
data.description: Control two cars simultaneously with the left and right arrows. Collect gold coins and avoid silver coins.

data.title: SYSTEMS
data.author: nes + theo
data.description: An experiment gone wrong has you trapped in a black hole! Try to build a portal by using three materials from each planet.

data.title: KickIt!
data.author: archiewald
data.description:
Grab a friend!
Score 3 goals!
Win!
Profit ++

data.title: Gone One Hour
data.author: Daniel Malo O.
data.description:
You start with $30, you can afford a Nerd (from the first table, below Producer). After the first 33s of the game, you can then afford hiring another, and so on.
Each unit produces a certain amount of $$$, you can increase this money per unit by getting the units better OS's. You can buy more than just one unit, with the More upgrade (which costs other units).
Goal:
GET TO A MILLION UNITS TOTAL BEFORE TIME RUNS OUT! Otherwise you just lost the game.

data.title: CD2 Offline
data.author: Yahor Padlucki
data.description: This is how Internet looked like in times of Dial Up

data.title: Star-Crasher
data.author: Luke / Deathray Games
data.description: Your ship has mysteriously crashed on a desolate planetoid. The damage is extensive, everything is OFFLINE, and you'll need to repair many of your systems before you can launch. Luckily you ship can auto-repair itself, and sensors detected some depots of fuel and parts on this planetoid, perhaps left by the previous inhabitants. Good luck!

data.title: ArcherFire: Duet of Aces
data.author: Santiago Zapata / Slashie
data.description: The war against the invading forces is on... team up with a friend and defeat the aliens in this co-op shooter!

data.title: Maps Off!
data.author: Totenbot
data.description:
Lost in a haunted tower, go online to see the map and progress through each floor.
But, going online makes you visible to the tower's ghosts. So, if you want to stay alive, yo must stay offline!

data.title: Chicken on a Line
data.author: Martin Hentschel
data.description: Keep the chicken from falling off the line. Swipe the end of the line to balance the chicken. Click to jump over nasty bugs that want to push you off. Get 2000 points to win!

data.title: LINK
data.author: Koaty
data.description: LINK is a top down multiplayer bullet-hell shooter. The game supports 2-4 player matches and consists of five rounds on randomly selected custom made maps. The last player surviving a given round receives a point and the player with the most points at the end of a game is declared the winner. You as a player are an entity within a computer terminal, you thirst for information and the only way to escape the offline world is to compete online with other entities.

data.title: Up & Down
data.author: Dinkar Pundir
data.description: Inspired form the classic game VVVVVV, in Up & Down the motive is simple. You can get a ball in the game which you can move left/right, and alternate the direction of its gravity by pressing Space key. So each time you press space the ball starts going in opposite direction. The motive is to make the ball reach the star. There are thorns as the level difficulty increases.

data.title: Key Battle
data.author: Kushagra Gour
data.description:
A battle of keys where you can also play OffLine with your friend on the same computer!
Controls for 2 player mode:
P1 - Left/Right/Enter - A/D/S
P2 - Left/Right/Enter - J/L/K

data.title: parlez13k
data.author: zmertens
data.description: A dumb dirty stupid simple game where you keep passing messages until the computer wants to go out with you!

data.title: Cloud Sweeper
data.author: Pragmatwit
data.description: This is a game about Cloud Storage Management. Free up your storage by moving units of cloud data *offline*. You have to get your data "off the grid", but be careful not to delete too many precious clouds in the process, or get trapped in a cluster!

data.title: Packet Thief
data.author: Daniel Jeffery
data.description: Packet Thief is a 2 player turn based strategy game. Take turns infecting part of a the network mesh with domination as your goal.

data.title: Man on Wire
data.author: xem
data.description: On August 7th, 1974, a young Frenchman named Philippe Petit stepped out on a wire illegally rigged between the New York World Trade Center’s twin towers.

data.title: Zero Distraction
data.author: Colin
data.description: About one month ago this competition started and only two days before the deadline I started working on my game.. I might have been distracted.

data.title: Key Sprinter 13k
data.author: LuisQuin
data.description: A two-player online game. You need a friend to play it.

data.title: Offline Dinosaur Game
data.author: Zutatensuppe
data.description: It is like google chrome offline dinosaur game.

data.title: Stay Off the Line!
data.author: Nigel
data.description: Game where you play as a tasty fish trying to survive in the ocean. Try to last as long as you can, and Stay Off the Line!

data.title: Network Defense
data.author: Gabriel Erbetta
data.description:
An evil hacker is invading your network, use your data cannon to take him out.
(The difficulty of the game is base on how good you are doing)

data.title: Peaceful Forest Walk
data.author: 4onen
data.description: Take a peaceful walk through a small forest practically glowing with life. Search for thirteen blue flowers. Detox from the online life.

data.title: Starship Toggle
data.author: Greg and Michael Taylor
data.description: Toggle abilities online/offline in this fast-paced shmup. Written collaboratively by a team of newly-learning developers with audio help from kevincennis/TinyMusic.

data.title: Storm Surge
data.author: Jared York
data.description: Storm Surge is a game about keeping a thunderstorm from interrupting your viewing of cat GIFs, memes, and maybe work. Don't let the lightning strike within the fence of your home. Use your fire cannon to evaporate the clouds so they can't strike.

data.title: Connect
data.author: Avikki, Gil20
data.description: Silly Sam(my colleague) always does something funny with my work system to knock me offline, help me to connect to the network.

data.title: The Matr13k
data.author: Agar3s - Giovanny Beltrán
data.description:
After saving Morpheus, Neo needs to find an exit from this JavaScript version of the matrix.
This is a beat em up, your objective is to kill everyone in your way in order to advance to the end of the rabbit hole.
Use the arrow keys to move, S and D keys to punch and kick, space to jump, you also have some special moves.

data.title: Captain Katamov
data.author: Patrick Hund
data.description: Your shift as Chief Network Security Officer is about to begin… All users are online and happy. In case of virus intrusion, CUT THEM OFF from the network to make sure they don't get infected!

data.title: Fiber Optic
data.author: Lee
data.description: The internet is a series of tubes. Oddly specific and particularly oriented tubes. And you must reconnect them to get back online.

data.title: 1024 Moves
data.author: GregPeck
data.description:
This puzzle can be solved in 1024 movements.
That is to say, I think it is not possible to do it in less than 1024 movements.

data.title: Friendly Alien
data.author: mdtraan
data.description:
You are a friendly alien who helps human. Navigate through the asteroids to reach the satelites and get them online.
Controls: Arrows keys to move

data.title: The_Coder's Game
data.author: The_Coder
data.description:
This is my 2018 Js13kgames game. You are a square who has lost its family and you need to get the beacons online for your family to find you. When beacons are offline they will be purple when they are online they will be blue. Beware of enemies (Red) they will deprive you of health (represented by how zoomed in you are).
Controls:
-W/A/S/D, Z/Q/S/D or arrow keys to move.
Credits:
Thank you to all the wonderful people on the js13kgames slack channel however here are the people who I would like to give a special thanks to.
-end3r
-rybar
-uduxs
-shreyasminocha
-mccordinator
-xem
-Koaty

data.title: Bulletcraft
data.author: Kakus
data.description:
An arena shooter, where your goal is too last as long as you can. Collect gems to buy upgrades, buy upgrades to destroy your enemies.
PS Don't mess with the vendor.

data.title: Alone in darkness
data.author: Animax
data.description:
You are alone in a strange place, only with your phone, offline...
Use it and all the apps available to find a 5 bars signal, then send a message to the world... while your signal is strong enough.
Then find your way out of this place.

data.title: [Hoverla]
data.author: Viktor Uhryn
data.description: No friends. No smartphones. No Internet. No one helps you. Just you and the mountain. Could you reach the peak? You can use only your mouse or touchscreen. Good Luck!

data.title: Predestine
data.author: satanas
data.description: Predestine is a small adventure game where you must retake control of your spaceship after your systems went offline and made you crash into an unknown planet. Follow the instructions of AEROS, the AI that will guide you on your desperate journey to escape.

data.title: Escape! Room
data.author: Joseph Ka'ainoa and Robert Rowlands
data.description: Escape! is a text based game in which you will have to use your wits and a few basic items to free yourself from imprisonment. This game pays homage to the old text based games from years ago. Type commands and then a keyword to proceed through game. Commands used in this game are Look and Use. If you get stuck, hit enter to get the room description again. Also, you can always try Look Self for initial clues. Good Luck!

data.title: Envisionator
data.author: Donitz
data.description: This is a short puzzle game about escaping a building lockdown with the aid of your trusty robot friend.

data.title: Cable Maze
data.author: rezaxdi
data.description: In Cable Maze you have to connect the LAN cable to the socket.

data.title: astro-link
data.author: Steven Campbell
data.description:
Link up the asteroids in a chain to clear them from the field by focusing on them with your gaze.
Pass through purple waypoints to add more power to your drone.
Find a yellow warp point to jump to another sector higher up. This will also clear all asteroids in your current chain.

data.title: PolyLithic
data.author: iShafayet
data.description: PolyLithic is a fast paced, skill based, sci-fi MOBA.

data.title: Signalmon
data.author: lopis
data.description: Signalmon is a tamagochi-like game for mobile browsers. Signalmon has 3 basic needs: Food, Sleep, Fun.

data.title: Lasergrid
data.author: Sorskoot
data.description: Oh no! The entire laser grid is offline! Maybe you can help fix it?

data.title: rec-rec
data.author: shu
data.description:
Make a rap with loops!
This is a remake of the Rec-Rec minigame in the Electroplankton audio game for Nintendo DS from 2005. I wanted to see if I could recreate it using web audio and canvas, in under 13k :) Everything is generated in code, there are no other assets.

data.title: Ranger Down
data.author: Nik Coughlin
data.description:
Lost contact with RANGER!
Take boat and investigate.

data.title: Pipe Net
data.author: dgreene
data.description: Align the connections to safely guide your precious internet cargo through the maze of the world wide web.

data.title: the Circle Masters
data.author: MrDobi
data.description: I just want to make small js moba ;)

data.title: Gear Of War
data.author: Danilo Pasquariello
data.description: A cover-based combat game designed and coded specifically for Gear VR using Samsung Internet VR.

data.title: Cable in forest
data.author: Eprincev
data.description: Route the cable over forest

data.title: The Mail
data.author: E.L.
data.description: Way before Internet there was mail. Try to send as many letters as you can.

data.title: Gun Gale Offline
data.author: Karan Ganesan
data.description: Karen Kohiruimaki always felt out of place in the real world. Due to her extreme height, she found it hard to make friends with other girls her age. Everything changes when she's introduced to VR and Gun Gale Online. In GGO, Karen is free to play the cute, chibi avatar of her dreams! Can Karen find friendship in this bullet-ridden MMO...?

data.title: LOGOUT
data.author: piesku.com
data.description:
In 2018, people live their lives in virtual reality.
Most never leave the community clusters assigned
to them at birth. A handful of lucky ones migrate
to premium clusters which boast 100% uptime.

data.title: Robo Galactic Shooter
data.author: Ashish Bardhan
data.description:
This is not just another space robot shooter game.
Your planet is under threat as the asteroids are approaching with uncertain speed. You mission is to destroy them all before your battery is drained out completely and making you offline permanently. However, you can look for golden stars to recharge battery.

data.title: The Line
data.author: Juankz
data.description: Solve the mysteries of this strange place. A game of puzzles and thoughts about technology.

data.title: Wander
data.author: razh
data.description:
WASD and/or Arrow Keys • Move.
Space • Jump.
Shift • Grappling Hook.

data.title: sven go home
data.author: amaro
data.description: Sven, the chicken, has been offline for too long. Take sven back home so he can go online and play some schnots.

data.title: We're Offline
data.author: Ronica
data.description: You're sitting in your room, playing, when suddenly the lights go off. Then, you realize lights are out everywhere. You check your phone, to switch on the Torch app, the phone don't work, nothing electrical, wireless works.

data.title: Long-distance relationship
data.author: kozakozak
data.description: Keep the connection between you and your loved-one alive. Explore dungeons around you and build your way to resources you need

data.title: Sand
data.author: hellosiyan
data.description: Sand is a game that will test your ability to recall various symbols in a stressful and harsh environment. As the player, you take on the role of an unnamed character, tasked with bringing the system back online.

data.title: Planet-X
data.author: Rune Hartvig
data.description: Strategy Space Adventure: Get all systems back online and explore Planet-X.

data.title: Dinoffline
data.author: Olivér Sepsik
data.description: This is a 3D remake of the famous Chrome Dino Game. Run as far as possible or race with one of your friends, but be careful not to bumb into any obsticles!

data.title: Castle Escape
data.author: Stuart Lee
data.description: A short roguelike game about escaping from a castle full of traps.

data.title: WiFiHunt
data.author: Shreyas Minocha
data.description: Roam around the city connecting to WiFi hotspots and completing the download and upload goals.

data.title: Emoji Swap
data.author: Curtastic
data.description: A match-3 tower defense. Matches create towers. Don't let the enemies through.

data.title: Misconnected
data.author: Kamil Solecki
data.description: You know that feeling, when you are sitting in front of your PC or console, mindlessly clicking around, opening and closing applications while popping in and out of reddit?

data.title: Whirled on the Spirit Spiral
data.author: Andras Serfozo
data.description: This is VR experiment with a little interaction, just look at objects to move forward. No controller needed. There is a little dark atmosphere inside, take care, and have fun! Thanks for visiting!:)

data.title: Bring your customers back online!
data.author: gheja and Vincenzo
data.description: Bring your customers back online!

data.title: SpaceDucts!
data.author: ickack
data.description: There's a lot of space out there ... between the walls of your ship. Connect broken pipes and wires deep in the belly of your ship. Fix it and get to the next wormhole. But don't drown or get electrocuted along the way! Play through 4 increasingly difficult levels to get your ship back into working order.

data.title: Invoke the Code!
data.author: Can Delibaş
data.description: You want to save your realm?

data.title: -4º Offline
data.author: Julio Soto
data.description:
A sad person sits on the toilet without internet waiting for you to restart the server.
Trace the green lines and don't get caught.

data.title: Alien War begins
data.author: Shashank TMK
data.description: The game revolves around protecting our planet from UFO's

data.title: Stay Off The Red Line
data.author: James
data.description: Stay Off the Red Line Go To the Exit

data.title: Offline Mobile Gear
data.author: Rankaru
data.description: Automated battle game with tap controls. Save the world with a remote mobile gear, send commands and instruction to your suit. Use different skills and tactics.

data.title: Storm Of The Chaos Bane
data.author: FoumartGames
data.description: Storm. Thunder.. when you hear it you know your internet connection can go off. So here is a game you can play even when you are disconnected, but remember to tweet your hi-score when you go online again !

data.title: Hans Fixes the Internet
data.author: madmarcel
data.description:
Hans the Giants' internet has broken
Help the man from the ISP get to Hans' giant house. Don't make the man in the van wait, smash, bash and eat everything that stands between Hans and the web.

data.title: Bellwoods
data.author: Matt DesLauriers
data.description: Bellwoods is an art game for mobile and desktop. Navigate your kite (which has drifted ‘off its line’) through endless fields of color and sound, trying to discover new worlds.

data.title: They Follow
data.author: Tero & Sami
data.description: A retro-action-horror-adventure game. Collect artifacts while staying away from the ghosts.

data.title: Donut Ride
data.author: Rachit
data.description: You favorite donut is somehow slipped on the road but now it's rolling. You need to save it from the wild traffic :P. Keep jumping !!!

data.title: BackupBot
data.author: Navin
data.description:
Mechanism:
Aim the cursor on enemy head. He will move for every 5 second. if enemy life(shown on topRight) becomes zero, you win. If game time (shown on topleft) runs out, you lose.
